scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run build:watch' 'wait-on build/z.js && npm run type-check:watch' 'nodemon --quiet --watch build --exec "wait-on build/z.js && npm run start:dev"'
scripts.build: npm run clear && babel src --out-dir build --extensions ".ts" --source-maps inline
scripts.pm2-start: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then npm run pm2-stop && npm run pm2-delete && npm run pm2-start ; else npm run set-pkg-start && pm2 start build/src/main.js --name "eodiro-api2" ; fi
scripts.pm2-restart: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then pm2 restart eodiro-api2 ; else echo 'No PM2 instance for eodiro API 2' ; fi
scripts.pm2-stop: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then pm2 stop eodiro-api2 ; else echo 'No PM2 instance for eodiro API 2' ; fi
scripts.pm2-delete: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then pm2 delete eodiro-api2 ; else echo 'No PM2 instance for eodiro API 2' ; fi
scripts.pm2-reboot: npm run build && npm run pm2-stop && npm run pm2-delete && npm run pm2-start
scripts.dev-legacy: npm run clear && nodemon -e ts --exec "npm run compile"
scripts.checkout-latest: git reset --hard && git checkout $(git describe --tags `git rev-list --tags --max-count=1`)
scripts.update: git reset --hard && git fetch --prune && npm run checkout-latest && npm install && npm run pm2-reboot
